metadata.title: CVE-2024-43867 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/nouveau: prime: fix refcount underflowCalling nouveau_bo_ref() on a nouveau_bo without initializing it (andhence the backing ttm_bo) leads to a refcount underflow.Instead of calling nouveau_bo_ref() in the unwind path ofdrm_gem_object_init(), clean things up manually.(cherry picked from commit 1b93f3e89d03cfc576636e195466a0d728ad8de5)

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
